Package bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes

Class ColdDrink

java.lang.Object
bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes.Drink
bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes.ColdDrink
All Implemented Interfaces:
Produceable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SodaColdDrink, SoftColdDrink
public abstract class ColdDrink extends Drink
In this class we are interested in realizing a Cold drink according to its fields and data.
Author:
Faraj This class "ColdDrink" is based on the father class "Drink".

    • ColdDrink

      public ColdDrink(float volume, float price, int drinkTypeIndex, float temperature, int coldTypeIndex)
      Construct a Drink object from 6 parameters.
      Parameters:
      volume - of the drink.
      price - of the drink.
      drinkTypeIndex - of the drink (Cold).
      temperature - of the drink.
      quantityOfSugar - : A random value of the quantity of Sugar.
      coldTypeIndex - : A hot drink that based off Coffee or Chocolate.
